ygData.subject: Thanks:)
ygData.msgSnippet: Thank you all for the helpful pause information. Once again this list makes playing a bard a pleasure! The information about twisting in the same digest was
ygData.messageBody:
Thank you all for the helpful pause information. Once again this list makes
playing a bard a pleasure! The information about twisting in the same digest
was great also. I am glad to read that others don't switch weapons and
instruments all the time during a battle. I have tried, but haven't been able
to do it. I am still trying to do the instrument switch thingy to be able to
do instrument only fighting. Sometimes I think I'm just a bit thick for not
being able to master this so quickly. But when I read other people's posts, it
makes me feel a bit better.
I thought it might be because I am slower than all you youngsters ( I'm 51),
but now I see even some really agile younguns have a hard time! Thank you for
making me feel better:)

Moonspinner
Level 31(FINIALLY) Bard
